title: Apex Legends

description:
Conquer with character in Apex Legends, a free-to-play Hero shooter where legendary characters with powerful abilities team up to battle for fame & fortune on the fringes of the Frontier.

Master an ever-growing roster of diverse Legends, deep tactical squad play and bold new innovations that go beyond the Battle Royale experienceâ€”all within a rugged world where anything goes. Welcome to the next evolution of Hero Shooter.
